item.title: Need help asap
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

for starters yes im offering rep++

ok i want something 2 happen once every minute, but i only want it 2 happen if something is true, geeze fuk it ill just say wat i need

i need special 2 gain 25% every minute, unless its 100+, then i want it 2 drain back down 2 100 if its higher

likeâ€¦

if (spec amount < 100) {
if (is 1 minute) {
specamount + 25;
set 1 minute
}}

other words i think wuld look like this

if (specialAmount < 100) {
if (specialTimer = 0) {
specialAmount +25;
specialTimer = 60;
}

then i declare specialtimer = 0; or 60;

or something then in proces something that decreases it, since my specials are screwed up, can some1 write me a tutorial 2 fix em or something? :] plz, thx, and rep++ 4 yuz :]]]]]]
